00025 /*
00026 #define INIT_ARGLIST wchar_t **CSFTitle, wchar_t **CSFTooltip, char **INIFileName, char **mapfilter, bool AIAllowed, int MPModeIndex
00027 #define INIT_ARGS CSFTitle, CSFTooltip, INIFileName, mapfilter, AIAllowed, MPModeIndex
00028 
00029 #define INIT_FUNC(addr) void (__stdcall * Allocate)(INIT_ARGLIST) = void (__stdcall *)(INIT_ARGLIST)addr;
00030 
00031 #define UNINIT_FUNC(addr) void (__thiscall * Deallocate)(void *x, int flags) = void(__thiscall *)(void *, int)addr;
00032 
00033 
00034 struct Initializer
00035 {
00036         void (__thiscall * Deallocate)(void *x, int flags);
00037         void (__stdcall * Allocate)(INIT_ARGLIST);
00038 };
00039 
00040 #define FACTORY(addr) static Initializer *Init = (Initializer *)addr;
00041 
00042 #define MPMODE_CTOR(clsname, addr) \
00043         clsname( \
00044                 wchar_t **CSFTitle, \
00045                 wchar_t **CSFTooltip, \
00046                 char **INIFileName, \
00047                 char **mapfilter, \
00048                 bool AIAllowed, \
00049                 int MPModeIndex) \
00050                         JMP_THIS(addr);
